Title: Barney & Friends
Writer: Sheryl Leach, Dennis DeShazer, Kathy Parker
Actors: Adrianne Kangas, Alex Wilson, Becky Swonke, Bob West, Brian Eppes, Corey Lopez, Demi Lovato, Jeanne Cairns, John David Bennett III, Kurt Dykhuizen, Lauren King, Makay, Michael Krost, Nathan Regan, Pia Manalo, Sara Hickman, Selena Gomez, Susannah Wetzel, Zachary Soza
Plot: Hey kids! Pick your feet up off the floor; it's time to dance with the dinosaur - Barney, that is, in this high-energy song and dance revue. You can't help but twist and shout to these infectious grooves, a compliation of funky favorites and danceable debuts. When you're ready to get down to some serious singing and swinging, Barney's got the dino dancin' tunes you'll want to see again and again!
